# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
Canada Border Services Agency - Flooring Replacement - Emerson, Manitoba
## Tender Information
- **Reference Number:** WS4296321658-Doc4300907768
- **Amendment Number:** 1
- **Solicitation Number:** WS4296321658
- **Publication Date:** November 15, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** December 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
## Requirement
The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Canada Border Services Agency requires the services of a contractor to replace the flooring at the CBSA's Emerson, Manitoba location. 

## Contract Requirements
- Procurement Category: CNST
- Notice Type: Request for Proposal
- Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
- Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
- Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Regions of Delivery: Manitoba
## Contact Information
- **Contact Name:** El Dela Cruz (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email:** el.delacruz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
## Access to the RFP
The RFP can be accessed via the Ariba Discovery platform at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17978853?extsite=MTc5Nzg4NTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
